description: Employee received a suspicious email requesting login credentials.
Detected ransomware activity on workstation PC-223.
Short-term network slowdown due to external traffic flood.
Attempted phishing email automatically blocked by filters.
Antivirus detected and quarantined a trojan on laptop LAP-119.
Multiple failed login attempts from unknown IP address.
Shared folder misconfigured, exposing sensitive documents internally.
Users reported receiving fake HR document links.
Extended DDoS attack mitigated through ISP filtering.
False positive malware detection on server due to outdated signature.
